headline: Token Security Achieves Rapid Growth in 2025 as Enterprises Address the Critical Security and Compliance Risks of Agentic AI
summary: With the Exponential Growth of AI Agents and Non-Human Identities, Industry Leaders Turn to Token Security, Driving Adoption, Demand, and Revenue GrowthNEW YORK, Jan. 14, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Token Security, the leader in identity-first AI security, today announced strong market momentum throughout 2025, driven by enterprise AI adoption, continuous product innovation, and industry recognition.
